name: enumerate-devices
description: A small project to normalize browser differences for enumerating media devices

scripts.bundle: npm install && node build.js && cp node_modules/attachmediastream/getusermedia.bundle.js test/getusermedia.bundle.js && cp node_modules/attachmediastream/attachmediastream.bundle.js test/attachmediastream.bundle.js

author: Xander Dumaine (xander.dumaine@gmail.com)
